scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:unit: npm run patch:test-runtime && vitest run tests/unit
scripts.test:integration: npm run patch:test-runtime && vitest run tests/integration
scripts.test:visual: npm run patch:test-runtime && vitest run tests/visual
scripts.test:perf: npm run patch:test-runtime && vitest run tests/perf
